title: Tasty Chicken Caesar Salad Recipe
content:
Chicken caesar salad tossed with creamy garlic and parmesan flavored creamy dressing topped with a poached egg.

I hope you will give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

 

Chicken Caesar Salad Recipe

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 15 mins

Total time: 25 mins

 

Recipe type: Salad

Cuisine: Italian

Serves: 2 servings

 

Ingredients

Lettuce - 4 cups

Eggs - 2

Bread - 2 slices

Cooked Shredded Chicken - 2 cups

 

FOR DRESSING:

Mayonnaise - 1 cup

Garlic - 2 tsp

Mustard Sauce - 2 tablespoon

Sugar - 1 tsp

Salt and pepper to taste

Milk as needed

Parmesan Cheese - as needed

Vinegar or Lemon Juice to taste

 

Instructions

Take sauce ingredients in a bowl and mix well.

Toast bread in a pan till golden.

Poach some eggs in hot water and drain it.

Take lettuce in a bowl, toss with cooked chicken, bread with sauce and toss well.

Top with Poached egg, salt, and pepper.

Serve it.

recommendations.content:

recommendations.content:
The delicious soupy chicken curry which tastes so delicious with some hot rice or some Paratha or roti. This can be made using nattu kozhi chicken as well.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Hand ( Pocket ) Pies Recipe
recommendations.content:
Super delicious chicken hand pie which is easy to make at home than buying from a shop. It will be a great appetizer or light lunch for any parties too.
 
Chicken Hand Pies Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 1 hour
Total time: 1 hour 10 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
